result.purpose: Defines enumerations related to trade types in a bridge context and provides unit tests for them.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating related enumerations and their tests within a dedicated directory.

internal/enums/bridge/trade_type.go.purpose: Defines an enumeration for trade types in a bridge context.

internal/enums/bridge/trade_type_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for unmarshalling TradeType from JSON.
